desc: Don't worry, it's an easy job, you just need to feed them on time and change the water for them regularly~

desc: It is the first step that sounds troublesome. You just need to overcome this and there won't be any more problems.

desc: Don't worry, I can keep them for you, you may come to my place to see them anytime.

desc: If there's only one goldfish in a fish tank, it will be really lonely.

desc: Don't worry, we can take care of them together.

desc: But this is tempting me to get closer to you.

title: Auditorium-1
desc: No matter what she wears, she's still attractive.

desc: You can dance wherever you want.

desc: Go, I believe you can still be the queen of the stage even the audience is just me.
